content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: Given the prime location and high-quality construction of this newly built apartment in the city center, I have given this some thought and would initially consider a rental price of around 1200 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating further to find a mutually agreeable price if you feel this is too high for your budget. Haoyu, let's hear your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the location and condition of the apartment, 1200 Euros seems a bit steep for me. I am a student and I have a budget of around 600 Euros per month for rent. I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month, which is a reasonable price in Duisburg for a one-bedroom apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As the landlord trying to maximize the profit, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I need at least 1000 Euros for this high-end apartment in this prime location. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
